text: "Tokyo" is a 2007 single released by Swedish artist Danny Saucedo, better known as Danny. In 2008, Danny participated with the song in Polish Sopot International Song Festival."Poland: Eurostars in Sopot festival ", http://esctoday.com/, 11 June 2008. Retrieved 15 March 2011. == Chart performance == The song entered and peaked at number 4 on the Swedish Trackslistan on 24 February 2007 and charted for six weeks. The song also peaked at number one on the Swedish singles chart on 22 February 2007. ===Charts=== {|class="wikitable" !Chart (2008) !align="center"|Peak position |- |Poland (Airplay Chart) | style="text-align:center;"|2 |- |Swedish Singles Chart |align="center"|1 |} == References == Category:2007 singles Category:Number-one singles in Sweden Category:Songs written by Jonas von der Burg Category:Songs written by Niklas von der Burg Category:Songs written by Anoo Bhagavan Category:2007 songs Category:Sony Music singles Category:Danny Saucedo songs
title: Tokyo (Danny Saucedo song)
